properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c1 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: As I rode out to Galway City At the hour of twelve at night Who should I see but a handsome damsel Combin' her hair by candlelight

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Lassie I have gold and silver Lassie I have houses and lands Lassie I have ships on the ocean They'll be all at your command

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Ratty atta to dum to dum to dum Ratty atta to dum to dum day Ratty atta to dum to dum to dum Ratty atta to dum to dum day

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: So to me you came a courtin My fine favor for to win But would gi' me the greatest pleasure If you never did call again

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: What would I do when I go a walkin' Walkin' out in the mornin dew What would I do when I go a walkin' Walkin out wi' a lad like you

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Lassie I have gold and silver Lassie I have houses and lands Lassie I have ships on the ocean They'll be all at your command

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: What do I care for your ships on the ocean What do I care for your houses and lands What do I care for your gold and silver All I want is a handsome man

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Did you ever see the grass in the mornin' All bedecked wi' jewels a rare Ever see a handsome lassie Diamonds sparklin in her hair

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Ever see a copper kettle Mended wi' an old tin can Ever see a handsome lassie Married off to an ugly man
